|brand = D-Link |model = DGS-2208 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = A2 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 04/20/2014 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/D-Link_DGS-2208_rev_A2 |series = <!-- Device series --> |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification -->
|fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |pcb_id = <!-- Baord ID --> |ethoui = <!-- ethoui -->
|sw1chip = Vitesse;VSC7388;VSC7388XYU, 0644ADCFB, VITESSE; |sw2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |sw3chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |sw4chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|eth_ports = 8 |eth_speed = 1GbE |eth_conn = 8P8C |eth_conn_dongle = |eth_standard = <!-- IEEE 802.3/3u/3ab --> |auto_mdix = supported |sup_jumbo = yes |sw_class = unmanaged
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = <!-- DC Volts --> |pwr_amp_dc = <!-- DC Amps --> |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|is_manuf = No |manuf = Cameo |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |accessible_UART =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 05/2007 |price = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |reldate = <!-- Release date --> |newegg = <!-- Newegg number --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|in|mm}} {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|mm|in}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|switch}} ==Overview== [https://web.archive.org/web/20141002201527/http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/lanwan/lanwan-slideshows/30194?task=view&limit=1&start=1 Previously shown here on '''SmallNetBuilder''', now on ''archive.org''] :All specifications are per the photos provided. :The '''D-Link''' logo, "8G Switch", and a date code of '''2007''' is silkscreened on the board shown. '''Cameo''' looks (and is assumed) to be the OEM.
This chipset probably encompasses more revisions than the A2, perhaps all of the A revision units..
[[Category:English Documentation]]
